member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ButtonS7.EnterPressed
member.summary: Raised when the button of the is pressed.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and/or the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with button events. Since the state of the button is passed to the delegate, so you can use the same event handler for both button states.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.ButtonS7.EnterReleased
member.summary: Raised when the button of the is released.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler and/or the event handler when you want to provide an action associated with button events. Since the state of the button is passed to the delegate, you can use the same event handler for both button states.
